title: Registration Now Open for NASA 2022 International Space Apps Challenge
summary: The NASA International Space Apps Challenge – the world’s largest annual hackathon – returns this year with the theme “Make Space,” which emphasizes NASA’s commitment to inclusivity.

title: The trampoline is now international: NASA and Roscosmos agree to seat swap
summary: No funds will be exchanged as part of the agreement.

title: Dmitry Rogozin has been dismissed as director general of Roscosmos [Updated]
summary: A thorn in NASA's side is gone. Will the next guy be any better?

title: Virgin Galactic selects Arizona for spaceplane manufacturing facility
summary: Virgin Galactic announced July 14 plans to assemble a fleet of suborbital spaceplanes in a new factory in a suburb of Phoenix.

title: Rocket Report: Vega-C is a sight to see; will Europe push SpaceX aside?
summary: "I am delighted to see solid progress towards first flight."
